JAPN 101.courseDesc: Introductory Japanese. Includes listening, speaking, reading, and writing.

JAPN 201.courseDesc: This courses includes listening, speaking, reading, and writing practice, with a focus on cultural competency and conversational skills. Builds on Japanese 103.

JAPN 202.courseDesc: This course includes listening, speaking, reading, and writing practice, with a focus on cultural competency and conversational skills. Builds onJAPN 201.

JAPN 310.courseDesc: Provides advanced practice in written and oral communication, including journalistic, professional, and creative writing. Examines contemporary cultural contexts through media and news. Taught in Japanese.

JAPN 320.fullName: Introduction to Language for the Professions
JAPN 320.courseDesc: Introduction to communication skills in areas such as contemporary business, health, and law in a culturally sensitive fashion. Taught in Japanese.
JAPN 320.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 36 credits

JAPN 340.courseDesc: Introduction to the analysis of power relations and issues of (in)equality rooted in contemporary political and socio-economic systems. Taught in Japanese.
JAPN 340.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 36 credits

JAPN 350.fullName: Introduction to Language, Media, and Society
JAPN 350.courseDesc: Introduction to the role of language and media in society, including sociolinguistics, gender, media studies, and communication. Taught in Japanese.
JAPN 350.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 36 credits

JAPN 410.courseDesc: Provides advanced grammar instruction and fosters translation and communication skills within a contemporary cultural context. Taught in Japanese.
JAPN 410.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 36 credits

JAPN 420.fullName: Advanced Studies in Language for the Professions
JAPN 420.courseDesc: Advanced communication skills in areas such as contemporary business, health, and law in a culturally sensitive fashion. Taught in Japanese.
JAPN 420.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 36 credits

JAPN 440.fullName: Advanced Studies in Power and Resistance
JAPN 440.courseDesc: Advanced analysis of power relations and issues of (in)equality rooted in contemporary political and socio-economic systems. Taught in Japanese.
JAPN 440.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 36 credits

JAPN 450.fullName: Advanced Studies in Language, Media, and Society
JAPN 450.courseDesc: Advanced analysis of the role of language and media in society, including sociolinguistics, gender, media studies, and communication. Taught in Japanese.
JAPN 450.repeatStatus: Can be repeated 8 times for 36 credits

JAPN I199.courseDesc: Self-directed within the area of study requiring intermittent consultation with a designated instructor.
JAPN I199.repeatStatus: Can be repeated multiple times for credit
